original_title: Vom Überleben - Die Geschichte der Mania Hartmayer-Breuer
overview: The life story of Mania Hartmayer-Breuer, who fled Germany at the age of 16 after the "Reichskristallnacht" and made her way via Antwerp and southern France to Rome, where she found shelter with Catholic nuns and finally experienced liberation. From there she arrived in the USA with the first refugee transport.
title: Vom Überleben - Die Geschichte der Mania Hartmayer-Breuer
